text: Connie Polman Tuin is a retired athlete from Canada. Tuin competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics. She was born on 10 January 1963.Connie Polman-Tuin == References == Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian athletes Category:Olympians for Canada Category:Sportspeople from British Columbia
title: Connie Polman-Tuin
